import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var size=typography.size,fontWeightRegular=typography.fontWeightRegular;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var dark=colors.dark;var tab={styleOverrides:{root:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",flexDirection:"row",flex:"1 1 auto",textAlign:"center",maxWidth:"unset !important",minWidth:"unset !important",minHeight:"unset !important",fontSize:size.md,fontWeight:fontWeightRegular,textTransform:"none",lineHeight:"inherit",padding:pxToRem(4),borderRadius:borderRadius.lg,color:"".concat(dark.main," !important"),opacity:"1 !important","& .material-icons, .material-icons-round":{marginBottom:"0 !important",marginRight:pxToRem(6)},"& svg":{marginBottom:"0 !important",marginRight:pxToRem(6)}},labelIcon:{paddingTop:pxToRem(4)}}};export default tab;
